item.title: The Fuel & Trip Calculator from Bayswater Car Rentals eliminates the need for guessing petrol budgets
item.description: To help people budget for fuel costs and travel time, Bayswater Car Rentals (BCR) has introduced the Fuel & Trip Calculator. This online tool is available to everyone, not just BCR customers. Arnold Kluck, CEO of BCR, explained that the company was founded to provide budget-friendly car rentals. He noted that customers frequently underestimate petrol costs at the end of their rental period, as itâ€™s easy to overlook this expense during travel planning.
